message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1000000. It's a truly unique opportunity, and I believe this price reflects its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 doesn't quite cover the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to come down to $950000,  which I believe is a fair compromise.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $950000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $920000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet at this price.
